author.persName: Mir Khwand (Muhammad b. Khawand Shah b. Mahmud).

msItem.title: Raudat al-Safa. Vol. VI.
msItem.note: Second flyleaf, verso: Presented to the Oriental Translation Com by Sir A Malet Bart History of Timur and his successor to A.H. 873. Part of the same work as Codrington/Reade No 29. Illuminated initial opening. Headings etc. in red.
msItem.incipit: Jawahir i hamd u sipas u la'ali i shukr-i bi qiyas

listBibl.bibl: For Sir Alexander Malet's gift see the Transactions for 1830, pp. xxxiv-xxxv.

handNote.persName: Fath Allah b. Salam Allah al-Jahrumi

bindingDesc.p: Written in the same hand as Codrington/Reade No 39 and in the same format and binding.

origin.p: Last day of Jumada I A.H. 996.

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org
